name: SecKeychainEventMask
desc: Bit masks corresponding to the events that can trigger a keychain callback.

items.name: static var lockEventMask: SecKeychainEventMask
items.desc: If the bit specified by this mask is set, your callback function is invoked when a keychain is locked.

items.name: static var unlockEventMask: SecKeychainEventMask
items.desc: If the bit specified by this mask is set, your callback function is invoked when a keychain is unlocked.

items.name: static var addEventMask: SecKeychainEventMask
items.desc: If the bit specified by this mask is set, your callback function is invoked when an item is added to a keychain.

items.name: static var deleteEventMask: SecKeychainEventMask
items.desc: If the bit specified by this mask is set, your callback function is invoked when an item is deleted from a keychain.

items.name: static var updateEventMask: SecKeychainEventMask
items.desc: If the bit specified by this mask is set, your callback function is invoked when a keychain item is updated.

items.name: static var passwordChangedEventMask: SecKeychainEventMask
items.desc: If the bit specified by this mask is set, your callback function is invoked when the keychain password is changed.

items.name: static var defaultChangedEventMask: SecKeychainEventMask
items.desc: If the bit specified by this mask is set, your callback function is invoked when a different keychain is specified as the default.

items.name: static var keychainListChangedMask: SecKeychainEventMask
items.desc: If the bit specified by this mask is set, your callback function is invoked when a keychain list is changed.

items.name: static var trustSettingsChangedEventMask: SecKeychainEventMask
items.desc: If the bit specified by this mask is set, your callback function is invoked when there is a change in certificate trust settings.

items.name: static var everyEventMask: SecKeychainEventMask
items.desc: If all the bits are set, your callback function is invoked whenever any event occurs.
